#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
 
    int x;
    cin >> x;
    while(x--)
    {
        int y,xx;
        string a;
        cin >> y >> a >> xx;
        if(a[0] == 'o')
            cout << xx*2 << endl;
        else
            cout << (xx*2)-1 << endl;
 
    }
 
 
    return 0;
}
